casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marvin Wade MILLSAPS. No. 374P13-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Barry H. Bloch, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Marvin W. Millsaps, Norlina, for Millsaps, Marvin Wade. Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of July 2015 by Defendant for Appellate Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
